translation.en: Diego, we used to be so close. Why are things so different now?
translation.fr:
On s'entendait bien,
qu'est-ce qui s'est passé ?

translation.en: Because, Dora, this isn't the jungle, where you can just do whatever you want
translation.fr:
T'es plus dans la jungle
où t'étais libre d'agir

translation.en: and be best friends with a monkey.
translation.fr: et où t'avais un singe comme copain.

translation.en: Okay? This is high school. It's life or death.
translation.fr: Le lycée, c'est marche ou crève.

translation.en: And it was hard enough already without having to take care of the class weirdo.
translation.fr:
C'était déjà dur
sans la barjo de service.

translation.en: Dora?
Sometimes we all need to hide. No?
translation.fr: Ça arrive, d'avoir envie de se cacher.

translation.en: [sighs] I guess, I never felt lonely
translation.fr: En fait, je me suis jamais sentie seule

translation.en: when I was by myself in the jungle.
translation.fr:
quand je n'avais personne,
dans la jungle.

translation.en: But now that I'm surrounded by kids…
translation.fr:
Maintenant,
je suis entourée de plein d'autres

translation.en: I feel alone all the time.
translation.fr: et je me sens toujours seule.

translation.en: -I think Diego hates me. -Ah. [clicks tongue]
No.
You are familia, mi amor. Huh?
translation.fr: Tu fais partie de la famille, mi amor.

translation.en: -Abuelita. -Hmm?
Am I a weirdo?
no more than the rest of us.
That's not a "no."
translation.fr: Ça ne veut pas dire non.

translation.en: Let's get you some frijolitos, okay?
translation.fr: Viens, on va te faire des frijolitos.

translation.en: [man] Okay, here's the scavenger hunt list.
translation.fr: Voici la liste pour la chasse au trésor.

translation.en: You know the drill.
Team up in groups of four and go get some photos.
translation.fr:
faites des groupes de quatre
et rapportez des photos.

translation.en: Oh, and if anybody needs me, I'll be in the cafeteria…
translation.fr: Moi, je serai à la cafétéria,

translation.en: questioning my life choices.
translation.fr: occupé à pleurer sur mon sort.

translation.en: -[Dora] Can I be on your team? -[Sammy] Do you guys need a fourth person?
translation.fr: Je peux être avec vous ? Il vous faut un quatrième ?

translation.en: [Diego] Hey, guys, us four?
[Dora] Can I be on your team?
-[Diego] Hey, guys. -[Dora] Can I be on your team?
[scoffs] You've got to be kidding me.
Of course, this is happening.
There's something really icy happening between you two.
-Was it the Disco Dork-a dance? -Well, I'm glad you brought it up--
translation.fr:
C'est à cause de Disco Dorade ? - Tu fais bien d'en parler...
- Non, je m'en fiche.

translation.en: I'm just kidding, I don't actually care.
translation.fr:
- Tu fais bien d'en parler...
- Non, je m'en fiche.

translation.en: Okay. "Find something that's more than 1,000 years old."
translation.fr:
"Trouvez quelque chose
qui a plus de mille ans.

translation.en: "Oldest relic gets two extra points." Come on!
translation.fr:
L'objet le plus vieux
rapportera deux points de plus."

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. Could you be any bossier?
translation.fr: Te gêne pas surtout, donne tes ordres.

translation.en: -Excuse me? "Bossier." Really? -Yeah.
translation.fr:
- Pardon ? Je donne mes ordres ?
- Oui.

translation.en: What's next? "Shrill?" Or am I being too difficult for you?
translation.fr:
Et je suis hystérique ?
Trop ingérable pour toi ?

translation.en: You left that out of your Misogyny 101 class.
translation.fr:
T'as oublié ça,
dans ton exposé misogyne.

translation.en: What? Do you have something to say?
translation.fr: Quoi ? Tu as quelque chose à dire ?

translation.en: I'm just so scared right now.
[Dora] Hey, what about this Egyptian exhibit?
Anything Egyptian would be the oldest relic by far.
translation.fr:
Tout ce qui est égyptien
est plus vieux que le reste.

translation.en: -Guys? -Psst.
I think I may be able to help you.
Overheard about your scavenger hunt.
translation.fr: Vous faites une chasse au trésor ?

translation.en: You were looking at the Egyptian posters.
-When does it open? -Oh, that's the problem, two weeks.
translation.fr:
- L'expo ouvre quand ?
- Dans deux semaines,

translation.en: They're unloading it today in the basement.
Look…
If it means that much to you, there may be a way for you to get down there.
translation.fr: si tu y tiens, tu pourrais descendre.

translation.en: [Sammy] This best not be some wild goose chase.
translation.fr:
J'espère que c'est pas
une chasse au dahu.

translation.en: I sure hope it is. I love chasing wild geese.
translation.fr:
Ce serait bien.
J'adorerais chasser le dahu,

translation.en: Until you catch one. Then it is not fun.
translation.fr:
mais si on en attrape un,
il faut se méfier.

translation.en: A caught goose is just the meanest!
Well, it's grouped by origin, so
translation.fr:
Tout est classé par origine, l'Égypte antique devrait être
dans cette allée.

translation.en: the Ancient Egyptian stuff should be in this aisle.
translation.fr:
l'Égypte antique devrait être
dans cette allée.

translation.en: -Hi. -Oh, no, she's been caught!
And I can totally explain why I'm here.
-Someone's coming. -Come with me, miss.
Hide! Hide!
-Where? -There, there, there!
Look what I found sneaking around.
Ah. An interloper.
A thief.
Or maybe an explorer.
-Hola, Dora. -Hi, I'm Dora, and--
translation.fr:
- Hola, Dora.
- Bonjour, je m'appelle Dora...

translation.en: -Wait, you already knew my name? -[footsteps approach]
Hey. You gotta help me.
I guess we win the scavenger hunt.
translation.fr: On a gagné la chasse au trésor.

translation.en: What? Hey, no.
Let me go!
-Hey, no! -Wait, wait, wait, wait.
-[Diego] What's going on? -[Randy] Is this a scavenger hunt?
translation.fr:
Qu'est-ce qu'ils font ?
Une chasse au trésor ?

translation.en: [Dora] What are you guys doing in here?
Sleep tight, Dora, and when you wake up,
translation.fr: Dors bien, Dora. À ton réveil,

translation.en: you will help us find your parents, and then Parapata.
translation.fr:
tu nous aideras à trouver tes parents
et Parapata.

translation.en: What's happening?
Where are we?
I think we're being unloaded from a plane.
translation.fr:
J'ai l'impression
qu'on nous sort d'un avion.

translation.en: We're not on a plane. We can't--
translation.fr: On ne peut pas être en avion.

translation.en: Oh, my God, we're on a plane! Oh--
translation.fr: C'est pas vrai, on est en avion !

translation.en: We've left the country without ID. We need to alert the US consulate.
translation.fr:
On n'a pas nos papiers,
il faut alerter le consulat.

translation.en: Dora, what happened?
-They're treasure hunters? -Why did I take Mandarin?
translation.fr:
Pilleurs de trésor ? Pourquoi j'ai fait chinois ?
Vous dites quoi ?

translation.en: -What are you guys saying? -[whirring, clattering]
translation.fr:
Pourquoi j'ai fait chinois ?
Vous dites quoi ?

translation.en: We gotta get out of here.
Oh, look, Dora brought a knife on the field trip, everybody.
translation.fr:
Dora avait un couteau
pour la sortie scolaire.

translation.en: I see three mercenaries. Armed.
translation.fr: Il y a trois mercenaires. Armés.

translation.en: Wait, there's a fourth.
I think he saw me.
-He's coming for us. -Ah!
Okay. I am not here. I'm an avatar. [whimpers]
translation.fr:
Je ne suis pas là,
je ne suis qu'un avatar.

translation.en: Dora! It is you!
-Who are you? -I'm a friend of your parents.
translation.fr:
- Vous êtes qui ?
- Un ami de tes parents.

translation.en: I'm rescuing you, Dora!
Come with me if you want to live--
-[Sammy] Where did he go? -Did… did he die?
translation.fr: Il est où ? Il est mort ?

translation.en: I'm okay! I'm okay. I need your help.
translation.fr:
Ça va, j'ai rien.
J'ai besoin de votre aide.

translation.en: But we have to run. Now!
-[woman] Boss! -Get them!
[Sammy] My parents did not sign a permission slip for the jungle!
translation.fr:
Mes parents n'ont pas signé
une excursion dans la jungle.

translation.en: Why are we here?
Where's the museum? Why, why, why?
-[Dora] How do we get out of here? -I don't know!
translation.fr: Comment on va s'échapper ? Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: Getting you out of the box was as far as my plan went.
translation.fr: J'avais juste prévu d'ouvrir la caisse.

translation.en: Huh! Swiper, at the ready!
Whatever happens, get that map.
translation.fr: Quoi qu'il arrive, rapporte la carte.

translation.en: Swiper, yes, swiping.
-[Diego] What kind of rescue is this? -It's the only one you've got.
translation.fr: C'est quoi, ce sauvetage ? J'ai pas mieux en stock.

translation.en: [Dora] Here. Let me try.
Hola. What the--
[Dora] Hey! That fox just swiped my map!
translation.fr: Le renard m'a chipé la carte.

translation.en: Where is it? Where is it? Where is it?
What part of, "The fox just swiped my map" don't you understand? Come on, help me!
translation.fr:
Vous comprenez pas : "le renard
m'a chipé la carte" ? Aidez-moi !

translation.en: Gotcha! There you are, my little friend.
translation.fr: Ça y est, je te tiens.

translation.en: No swiping, you… you swiper!
translation.fr: Arrête de chiper, espèce de chipeur.

translation.en: She's amazing.
-[Swiper screams] -Oh, shoot!
Man! I'm stuck upside-down.
translation.fr: Mince ! Je suis coincé la tête en bas.

translation.en: Swiper, no-- [gasps]
-Good job, Swiper. -I know, man.
translation.fr:
- Bien joué, Chipeur.
- Je sais, mec.

translation.en: Get her!
[Diego] Dora!
-Now what do we do? -Come on, come on!
-Where did our rescuer go? -[Randy] He ran away!
translation.fr:
- Et notre sauveteur ?
- Il s'est sauvé.

translation.en: -Get in! -[Swiper] Open this door, man!
-[man] Get in! -[Swiper] I'm not joking, man!
Viper, get the truck! Don't let them escape!
translation.fr:
Au camion.
Il faut pas qu'ils s'échappent.

translation.en: -Hold on! -[Diego] Oh!
[man] Sorry!
Are they following?
[mercenary] Where have they gone?
This is the only road for miles. Keep your eyes peeled.
translation.fr:
Ils doivent être par là.
Gardez les yeux ouverts.

translation.en: Not anymore. [sighs]
Are you kids okay?
-Not really. -"Not really"?
Understatement of the century.
I was just kidnapped and chased by bad guys!
translation.fr:
J'ai été enlevée
et poursuivie par des bandits

translation.en: And a fox with a mask! Everyone saw that, right?
translation.fr:
et un renard masqué.
Vous l'avez vu ?

translation.en: Like, why does that fox need to remain anonymous?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi un renard
tient à l'anonymat ?

translation.en: Who is gonna recognize one specific fox?
-Mm. -How did you know my name?
You were an infant the last time I saw you.
translation.fr: Quand je t'ai vue, tu étais bébé.

translation.en: My name is Alejandro Gutierrez. I'm a professor of ancient languages
translation.fr:
Je suis Alejandro Gutierrez, prof de langues anciennes
à l'université de Lima.

translation.en: at San Marcos University in Lima, Peru.
translation.fr:
prof de langues anciennes
à l'université de Lima.

translation.en: Your parents and I were in constant contact during their time here.
translation.fr:
Tes parents et moi,
on est toujours restés en contact.

translation.en: Then two weeks ago, your parents' calls stopped.
translation.fr:
Mais il y a deux semaines,
ils ont cessé d'appeler.

translation.en: Since then… silencio.
-That means silence. -Yeah. I got that one.
translation.fr:
- Ça veut dire silence.
- J'avais compris.

translation.en: They haven't answered any of my sat phone call for weeks, either.
translation.fr: Ils ne me répondent plus non plus.

translation.en: Your father sent me this just a week before, in case I could help.
translation.fr:
Ton père venait de m'envoyer ça,
au cas où.

translation.en: Ah, Papi's journal!
[Alejandro] So I came here to make sure they were okay.
Tracked them this far.
I've been staking it out, hoping for a sign from them.
translation.fr:
J'ai épié l'aérodrome
en espérant un signe de leur part

translation.en: [stutters] And then I saw you poke your head out of that crate
translation.fr:
et je t'ai vue
sortir la tête de cette caisse

translation.en: and I-- I said to myself, "Dora!"
Dora the kidnapped teenager!
But how did you recognize me?
Well, you look sort of exactly the same.
But I'm afraid I have no idea where to find your parents.
translation.fr:
Mais je ne sais pas du tout
où sont tes parents.

translation.en: Don't worry. I can track my parents in the jungle.
translation.fr:
Ça ira,
je sais les retrouver dans la jungle.

translation.en: -Let's go! -Ho… Hold up.
Or we could call the local police
translation.fr: On peut aussi appeler la police

translation.en: and-- and have them come rescue us with, like, a SWAT team.
translation.fr: et se faire évacuer par le SWAT.

translation.en: Hmm. Yeah, that sounds like another solid option.
Of course!
Hello? 911? Can you please come and get us?
translation.fr:
Allô, les secours ?
Vous venez nous chercher ?

translation.en: We're at the corner of Rain and Forest.
translation.fr:
On est à l'angle
de "forêt" et de "tropicale".

translation.en: Okay, I get it! I just want to go home.
translation.fr:
J'ai compris.
Je veux rentrer chez moi.

translation.en: We're gonna die out here.
Look around you.
This is the kind of place where people die.
translation.fr: C'est le genre d'endroit où on meurt.

translation.en: I mean, in a way, every place is the kind of place where people die.
translation.fr:
On peut dire ça
de tous les endroits, partout.

translation.en: -Okay, well, that's a bummer notion. -Guys, guys.
Listen, finding Dora's parents is our best chance of getting home.
translation.fr:
Trouver les parents de Dora
nous permettra de rentrer.

translation.en: My aunt and uncle will know what to do.
Dora's my cousin, I can't just let her go off with some
translation.fr:
Dora est ma cousine,
je ne la lâche pas

translation.en: strange and anxious man we just met.
translation.fr:
avec un type bizarre
qu'on ne connaît pas.

translation.en: Thank you, Diego.
Now let's go find Dora's parents.
translation.fr: Allons trouver les parents de Dora.

translation.en: [Dora] Look! In there! That's their car!
Here. This is it. Our family symbol.
translation.fr: Là, c'est le symbole de notre famille.

translation.en: -This is where they started hiking. -Are we there?
translation.fr: Ils sont partis à pied. On est arrivés ?

translation.en: Where are your parents? I don't see your parents.
translation.fr:
Où sont tes parents ?
Je ne les vois pas.

translation.en: We can't go any further by car.
translation.fr: On ne peut pas avancer en voiture,

translation.en: -The jungle gets too dense. -So, how do we--
translation.fr:
- la jungle est trop dense.
- Comment on va...

translation.en: We must enter the jungle on foot.
translation.fr: Il faut y entrer à pied.

translation.en: Luckily, I prepared for this possibility.
Okay, I may have gone a little overboard on supplies.
translation.fr:
J'ai eu la main lourde
sur les provisions.

translation.en: Be my guest.
This is a legit nightmare!
I-- I'm not going in first, though. You go first, Dora. It feels right.
translation.fr: Par contre, je passe pas le premier. Vas-y, toi, c'est normal.

translation.en: [Dora] You all have nothing to worry about.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas de quoi s'inquiéter.

translation.en: The jungle is perfectly safe!
translation.fr: Il n'y a aucun danger dans la jungle.

translation.en: Just don't touch anything. Or breathe too deeply.
translation.fr:
Mais ne touchez à rien.
Et ne respirez pas trop fort.

translation.en: [Randy] Are you sure your parents went this way?
translation.fr: Tu es sûre qu'ils sont passés par là ?

translation.en: [Sammy] Okay, what are these?
Warning signs.
Totems.
Legend tells of a deadly ancient militia
translation.fr: La légende parle d'une milice féroce

translation.en: dedicated to protecting Parapata from outside eyes.
translation.fr:
chargée de protéger Parapata
des étrangers.

translation.en: No one has seen Los Guardianes Perdidos…
translation.fr:
Personne n'a vu
Los Guardianes Perdidos

translation.en: The Lost Guardians, for centuries.
-What was that? -Quechua.
-Ancient Inca. Impressive. -[Sammy] What does it mean?
translation.fr: la langue des Incas. Impressionnant. Ça veut dire quoi ?

translation.en: "All those that seek Parapata…
shall surely perish."
Okay, I am ready for my parents to come and get me now.
translation.fr:
C'est bon,
mes parents peuvent venir me chercher.

translation.en: [Alejandro] You have nothing to worry about.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas à s'inquiéter,

translation.en: I promise. I mean, there's no need to overreact.
translation.fr: je vous assure. Inutile de s'affoler.

translation.en: Get it off! Get it off! Get it off! [grunts]
And that was just an example of the dangers of overreacting.
translation.fr:
Ce n'était qu'un exemple
des risques qu'on court quand on s'affole.

translation.en: -[Sammy whimpers] -[Dora] You okay? Fine. Totally fine.
Hey. I found one of those red loops.
My parents' symbol.
-We must be getting close. -Oh, thank you, thank you!
We're going home.
This is my parents' camp.
Or was. I mean, this is their stuff.
translation.fr: Ou c'était. Ce sont leurs affaires.

translation.en: -Someone's watching. -[rustling]
[Sammy] I can feel it.
-Kill it! Quickly, kill it! -Boots! Oh!
Oh, Boots, I'm so happy to see you!
She knows this monkey?
Of course, she knows this monkey.
[sighs] Thank goodness.
-He saw them. -[Boots squeals]
Oh, sorry. Um, this is Boots. Boots, these are, um, my friends.
translation.fr:
Désolée. Je vous présente Babouche,
Babouche, mes amis.

translation.en: -They're here to help me. -No. We're here to get saved.
translation.fr:
Ils sont venus m'aider. On est venus
pour qu'on nous sauve.

translation.en: Oh, and FYI, we are not friends.
They did this quickly.
-See how they rushed it? -Yeah.
translation.fr: on voit qu'il est mal fait.

translation.en: Still, I can track my parents better than any mercenaries.
translation.fr:
De toute façon, je trouverai mes parents
mieux que les mercenaires.

translation.en: We just have to get to them first.
translation.fr:
Il suffit
qu'on les trouve les premiers.

translation.en: Uh. May we stop for a moment? I need to do a thing.
translation.fr:
On peut s'arrêter ?
J'ai un truc à faire.

translation.en: -What? -Just a thing.
What thing?
I know what this is.
translation.fr: Je sais ce qu'il y a.

translation.en: -You have to poo. -[scoffs] No. That isn't it.
translation.fr:
- Tu veux faire caca.
- Ce n'est pas ça.

translation.en: Of course I have to poo! I haven't pooed in 48 hours!
translation.fr:
Si, je veux faire caca,
je n'ai pas fait depuis 48 h,

translation.en: I'm sweating, and every step is agony!
translation.fr:
je transpire
et je souffre à chaque pas.

translation.en: Well, don't look at me cover your ears!
translation.fr:
Ne me regardez pas
et n'écoutez pas.

translation.en: Probably should've said "cover your ears" before you said "poo" like, 47 times.
translation.fr:
Il fallait nous prévenir
avant de dire "caca" 47 fois.

translation.en: -[scoffs] -[Dora] There's no need to be afraid.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas à avoir peur,

translation.en: I have an idea.
-Let's turn this into a song. -Let's not.
translation.fr:
- On va en faire une chanson.
- Ou pas.

translation.en: You know what? I think it's passed.
Why don't we just go back to the group, and we can just--
translation.fr:
On devrait retrouver les autres
et après...

translation.en: Seriously? You had that in your backpack, too?
translation.fr: Tu es sérieuse, tu as ça sur toi ?

translation.en: A poo shovel.
♪ It's time to dig the poo hole ♪
translation.fr: Il faut creuser un trou à caca

translation.en: -♪ Dig, dig, dig ♪ -[Boots hums]
♪ Just grab a shovel It's a piece of cake ♪
translation.fr:
Attrape une pelle
C'est un jeu d'enfant

translation.en: ♪ Make sure the hole is deep And there isn't a snake ♪
translation.fr:
Le trou doit être profond
Et sans serpent dedans

translation.en: ♪ I'm telling you this So you will be wiser ♪
translation.fr:
Je te dis tout ça
Pour ta culture personnelle

translation.en: ♪ And don't forget It's a natural fertilizer ♪
translation.fr:
Et n'oublie pas,
C'est un fertilisant naturel

translation.en: I believe in you, Sammy. I believe that you can do this.
translation.fr:
Je crois en toi, Sammy,
tu peux y arriver.

translation.en: Also, medically, you have to do this.
translation.fr: Et médicalement, tu n'as pas le choix.

translation.en: -[exhales] -Okay, bye! Come on, Boots.
She's good.
There's nothing to be afraid of.
translation.fr: il n'y a rien à craindre.

translation.en: Not good. Not good at all.
translation.fr: Pas bon, pas bon du tout.

translation.en: -Go, go, go! -[Randy screams]
Real arrows flying at us! Real arrows flying at us!
translation.fr:
On nous envoie de vraies flèches !
Des vraies !

translation.en: ♪ Dig the poo hole ♪
♪ Dig, dig, dig ♪
-[Dora] Run! -Look away! Look away!
-Sorry, no time! -We saw nothing!
translation.fr:
- Pas le temps.
- On a rien vu.

translation.en: -Run for your life! -We gotta go!
-[Sammy] What is happening? -It's the curse!
The curse is gonna perish us. We're gonna perish all over the place!
translation.fr: Elle va nous périr, on va périr à fond !

translation.en: There, there! Follow me!
[Dora] This way!
I'm hit! They hit me! I'm bleeding out!
I am losing life force!
Oh, no, no, no! No, it's a juice box. It's just a juice box.
translation.fr: C'est un jus de fruit, c'est tout.

translation.en: I think we're safe. For now.
translation.fr:
Je crois qu'on est tranquilles
pour l'instant.

translation.en: -[Sammy screams] -Not safe. Not safe! Not safe!
[Randy] I want to go home! I want to go home!
I'm okay! I'm okay!
[Alejandro] Guys…
I can't say for sure…
because I'm… I'm fairly confident I just sustained a…
translation.fr:
parce que je suis presque certain que je
viens de subir une grave lésion au cerveau

translation.en: a serious brain injury, but I do believe…
translation.fr:
parce que je suis presque certain que je
viens de subir une grave lésion au cerveau mais je crois bien

translation.en: we may have just met Los Guardianes Perdidos.
translation.fr:
que nous venons de croiser
Los Guardianes Perdidos,

translation.en: The Lost Guardians.
[Diego] I thought you said they were just legends.
translation.fr: Vous disiez que c'était une légende.

translation.en: These are the same Inca sun symbols that were on those totems.
translation.fr:
Ce sont les mêmes symboles incas
que sur les totems.

translation.en: So these are like, legit arrows?
Like, kill-people arrows?
translation.fr: Des flèches qui tuent et tout ?

translation.en: [Alejandro] The markings are quite authentic.
Hey, you okay?
"Okay?"
Okay? No, I'm not okay, okay? I want to go home!
translation.fr: Si ça va ? Non, ça ne va pas, ça te va ? Je veux rentrer,

translation.en: I want to be staring at my phone, in an ice-cold room,
translation.fr:
je veux fixer mon téléphone,
dans une pièce climatisée

translation.en: drinking a frozen coffee beverage!
And I know that makes me sound real basic, but that is what I want!
translation.fr:
C'est peut-être matérialiste
mais c'est comme ça.

translation.en: Oh, and by the way, the poo song lied.
translation.fr:
En plus,
ta chanson du caca mentait.

translation.en: Yeah, it was totally dangerous, arrows rained down on me.
translation.fr:
C'était dangereux,
il pleuvait des flèches

translation.en: I hate it here!
And I can't even storm off 'cause this jungle will eat me!
translation.fr:
Je peux même pas partir,
la jungle va m'avaler.

translation.en: Maybe a song will help.
♪ It's okay to freak out sometimes ♪
-♪ It's really okay… ♪ -No more songs!
translation.fr: C'est normal... Arrête avec tes chansons.

translation.en: Okay.
Are you here to yell at me, too?
translation.fr: Tu viens me crier dessus aussi ?

translation.en: Nah. Actually, I'm here to avoid getting yelled at.
translation.fr:
Non, je suis venu
pour qu'on me crie pas dessus.

translation.en: It's scary to be responsible for other people.
translation.fr:
Ça fait peur,
d'être responsable des autres.

translation.en: It's easier when you're alone.
Is it?
Look, I know she can be like, a real pain in the butt sometimes, but…
translation.fr:
Je sais qu'elle peut être
très énervante, mais...

translation.en: she's not all bad, I guess.
translation.fr: elle n'est pas si mauvaise, je crois.

translation.en: You have an attraction for her.
What? No.
No, I definitely never said that.
You know, a life-threatening situation
can often accelerate the mating process in many species!
Okay, no. Just slow your roll.
And please don't ever say the word "mating" again.
-Ever. -Mm. Mm-hmm.
Let's just get out of here.
translation.fr: Il faut qu'on se sorte de là.

translation.en: -Are we even going the right way? -[Boots laughs]
translation.fr:
On est sur la bonne voie,
au moins ?

translation.en: What?
Fox tracks.
[Viper] I scouted the area. There's a freshly cut path to the north,
translation.fr:
J'ai inspecté le coin, il y a un nouveau chemin
au nord, des ruines à l'est.

translation.en: some ruins to the east.
translation.fr:
il y a un nouveau chemin
au nord, des ruines à l'est.

translation.en: [Powell] Did you find any more of their markings?
-[Viper] No. -[Powell] Okay, then we head north. [Viper] That's the path they took.
translation.fr:
- Alors, on prend vers le nord.
- Comme eux.

translation.en: -Hi, guys! -[all gasp, hush]
[Viper] What was that?
What, you're scared of monkeys now?
[Viper] Monkeys can carry three times their body weight.
translation.fr:
Les singes peuvent porter
trois fois leur poids.

translation.en: So that's a yes? Viper's scared of monkeys.
translation.fr:
Ça veut dire oui ?
Viper a peur des singes.

translation.en: It's just a monkey fact.
That's all it is.
[Sammy] Where are those guys?
[Randy] They're definitely dead. It's just you and me now.
translation.fr:
Ils doivent être morts,
il y a plus que nous.

translation.en: -Of course, we'll have to start a family. -We are not starting a family.
translation.fr:
Forcément,
on devra fonder une famille. On ne fondera pas de famille.

translation.en: Eh, give it a few days.
Uh! Hey! Where have you guys been?
-[Alejandro] Hi, guys. -Look, I'm really sorry, Dora.
It's fine. It's fine, Sammy.
We saw the mercenaries. They're ahead of us.
translation.fr: On a vu les mercenaires. Ils nous devancent.

translation.en: We'll have to follow the mercenaries from a safe distance.
translation.fr: Il faut les suivre de loin.

translation.en: No. We're not following them. My parents didn't go that way.
translation.fr:
On ne les suit pas,
mes parents sont ailleurs.

translation.en: My father says that the way to Parapata passes through an opera house.
translation.fr:
Mon père dit que la route de Parapata
traverse un opéra,

translation.en: The opera house was built hundreds of years ago
by Europeans during the rubber boom.
There'll be nothing but ruins by now.
translation.fr: Il ne doit rester que des ruines.

translation.en: This is the way they went.
This must be it.
Or was it.
It doesn't look like any opera singers have been here for a while.
translation.fr:
Il y a pas eu de représentation
depuis longtemps.

translation.en: The Europeans may have built it, but…
the jungle has taken it back.
translation.fr: mais la jungle a repris ses droits.

translation.en: -[farting sound] -Ew, my feet.
Why does the ground feel like chocolate pudding?
-[farting sound] -Excuse me.
-[laughing] -[Alejandro] Wait, wait, wait!
I ate a lot of frijoles and chimichangas.
translation.fr:
j'ai mangé trop de frijoles
et de chimichangas.

translation.en: -I ate chile con carne. -[farting sound]
translation.fr: J'ai mangé du chili con carne.

translation.en: [Alejandro] I ate mucho pozole.
Wait. Anyone else notice the walls are getting higher?
translation.fr:
Vous trouvez pas
que les parois grandissent ?

translation.en: -Quicksand! -[Sammy yelps]
-You got to be kidding me! -[Randy] Quicksand really exists?
translation.fr: C'est pas vrai ? Ça existe en vrai ?

translation.en: I thought it was just a video game thing. Like Pitfall!
translation.fr:
Je croyais qu'il y en avait
que dans les jeux vidéo, genre Pitfall.

translation.en: -It's a classic. -How do we get out of this stuff?
translation.fr: C'est une référence. Comment on sort de ce truc ?

translation.en: Okay, rule number one of quicksand, don't panic.
translation.fr: Règle numéro un, pas de panique

translation.en: You'll only get sucked in further. Lie down flat on your back.
translation.fr: ou on s'enfonce. Allongez-vous sur le dos.

translation.en: You have to distribute your weight.
Okay. All right.
[Alejandro] No, no, no. I'm not doing that.
translation.fr: Non, non. Je ferai pas ça.

translation.en: Yeah. No, this feels super wrong.
[Dora] Now make little movements with your legs
translation.fr: Faites de petits mouvements de jambes

translation.en: to make space for the water to get between the sand.
translation.fr: pour que l'eau s'infiltre dans le sable.

translation.en: And once your legs are free, simply backstroke out of the quicksand.
translation.fr: Quand vos jambes sont libérées, vous pouvez sortir en nageant.

translation.en: Oh, give me a break. We're gonna die in here.
translation.fr: Tu parles, on va mourir ici.

translation.en: Look, look! It's working! It's working!
Come on.
Thanks.
-Help me! -Alejandro, you have to stop moving.
translation.fr: À l'aide ! Alejandro, ne bougez plus.

translation.en: Stay sti--
Why have you all gone quiet?
It's bad, isn't it? [yelps]
Oh, no! Shoo!
Cha! [spits] No, no, no! Not on the face.
-Not on the face. Ah! [yells in Spanish] -Oh!
-It's another male. They will now fight. -No, no!
translation.fr: Un autre mâle. Ils vont se battre.

translation.en: I'm not sure those guys are fighting.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas s'ils se battent.

translation.en: Oh, it's a female.
They are not fighting. They are mating!
translation.fr: Ils ne se battent pas, ils s'accouplent.

translation.en: -Get it off! -Quick, someone go get a branch.
-I'm sinking! -No, no, wait!
Guys, come back!
[Diego] It's a jungle full of trees and I can't find a branch.
translation.fr:
Y a plein d'arbres
et pas une branche.

translation.en: [Dora] Alejandro! Alejandro!
I see feet. Human feet!
Over here!
[Dora yelps] Okay, everyone. One, two, three! Ah!
translation.fr:
Attention, tous ensemble.
Un, deux, trois !

translation.en: -I'm alive? -[both] Yes!
-I'm alive! I'm alive! -Yes! Yes!
-I'm alive! I'm alive! [laughing] -Yes! [chuckling]
[sobbing] I'm alive, I'm alive…
translation.fr: Je suis vivant, je suis vivant...

translation.en: I thought I was gonna die.
I thought I was gonna die.
It's so awkward when adults cry.
translation.fr: C'est gênant, un adulte qui pleure.

translation.en: You just don't know where to look.
translation.fr: On ne sait plus où se mettre.

translation.en: And I was stupid!
And then a scorpion went…
mating on my head.
I'm so sorry. My whole life is a lie.
translation.fr: Pardon. Ma vie entière est un mensonge.

translation.en: I'm a fraud.
-No! No. -Yes.
Everyone thinks that sometimes, Alejandro.
translation.fr: Ça arrive, de se sentir comme ça.

translation.en: I'm a bad guy.
-No. -Yes.
-No. No. No. -No, yes, I am. Yes.
translation.fr:
- Non. Non. Non.
- Non, oui, je le suis.

translation.en: -I'm a-- I'm a bad guy! [scoffs] -No!
No, you are not a bad guy. No one is, deep down inside.
translation.fr:
Vous n'êtes pas méchant,
personne ne l'est vraiment.

translation.en: -Thank you, Dora. -Come on.
Where are we?
Someone lives here.
And that someone's coming.
She hasn't seen my parents.
translation.fr: Elle n'a pas vu mes parents

translation.en: And she doesn't seem very interested in helping me find them.
translation.fr:
et m'aider à les retrouver
ne l'intéresse pas.

translation.en: Perhaps she knows how to get to Parapata.
translation.fr: Elle pourrait nous mener à Parapata ?

translation.en: Parapata!
[Sammy yelps] She seemed pretty interested in that.
Are they supposed to be us?
That seemed bad, right?
-Everyone thinks that was bad? -Yeah, a little bit.
What? What did she say?
She said anyone seeking Parapata is cursed.
translation.fr:
Elle dit que tous ceux
qui cherchent Parapata sont maudits.

translation.en: -Well, that's great. -[Diego sighs]
But she also said she knows how to get you guys back downriver.
translation.fr: Et elle peut vous ramener au fleuve

translation.en: -She can take you home. -[scoffs]
All of you.
Yes. Yes! I am saved! I…
translation.fr: Je suis sauvé ! Je... veux dire,

translation.en: mean… [clears throat] …only if you are cool without us, obviously.
translation.fr:
Je... veux dire, seulement si tu n'as pas besoin de nous,
bien sûr.

translation.en: You got me into this mess, but I guess you're getting me out of it,
translation.fr:
Je suis là par ta faute
mais tu me sors aussi de là,

translation.en: so we'll call it even.
I'm coming with you. I can't let you go alone.
translation.fr:
Je reste avec toi.
Je ne peux pas te laisser seule.

translation.en: I mean, plus you're my cousin. There's, like, rules about that.
translation.fr:
En plus, t'es ma cousine,
ça se fait pas.

translation.en: This is where we split up.
translation.fr: C'est là que nos chemins se séparent.

translation.en: Oh, my…
I, uh… I hope you don't die or anything.
translation.fr: J'espère que tu ne vas pas mourir.

translation.en: You, too.
Is she staring at us?
-Yeah. -Okay, time to go.
Diego, Dora, let's go.
-Hmm? -She says stick to the path.
Oh. Let's go. Bye, guys.
Good luck, Dora.
-[speaking Quechua] -Why is she in such a hurry to get us out of here?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi elle est si pressée
de nous faire partir ?

translation.en: Randy, wait, stop.
Oh, no. Oh, no!
No, no, no, come on! We've got to warn them!
translation.fr:
Non, non, viens,
il faut les prévenir !

translation.en: Not something you see every day.
[Alejandro] Are you sure about this?
[Dora] Well, she said this was the way we had to go.
translation.fr: C'est le chemin qu'elle a indiqué.

translation.en: Don't touch anything.
Yes! Yes! Yes! We did it!
[Alejandro] Oops.
-We're in a spore field! -Don't breathe it in!
translation.fr:
C'est un champ de spores. - Ne respirez pas.
- Il faut qu'on s'en aille.

translation.en: -Let's get out of here! -It's okay. It's okay.
translation.fr:
- Ne respirez pas.
- Il faut qu'on s'en aille. Ça va.

translation.en: If these were poisonous spores, we'd all be dead by now.
translation.fr:
S'ils étaient toxiques,
on serait déjà morts.

translation.en: Come on, Diego-- Oh, whoa.
What?
-What? What? -Oh, boy.
What's happening?
-You… You look weird. -You look weird.
-No, you look weird. -You-- No, you.
-No, you! You! -You! You! Him!
I don't need these clothes anymore!
translation.fr: J'ai plus besoin de mes vêtements !

translation.en: I'm sure this will pass. It's fine!
translation.fr: Je pense que ça va passer, c'est rien.

translation.en: Fine? Are you kidding me?
This is incredible! [grunts]
Hi, Dora!
Hi there, Map! Oh, I thought I lost you.
translation.fr:
Bonjour, la carte,
je croyais t'avoir perdue.

translation.en: You can never lose me. I'm always with you!
translation.fr:
Tu ne peux pas me perdre,
je suis toujours avec toi.

translation.en: -Hi, Dora. -[gasps]
Backpack!
My mouth is a zipper!
translation.fr: Ma bouche est une fermeture éclair.

translation.en: -Hi, Dora. -Hmm.
-I don't know you, small rock. -Oh.
translation.fr: Je te connais pas, petit caillou.

translation.en: -But it's nice to make your acquaintance. -Ah.
translation.fr:
Mais je suis ravie
de faire ta connaissance.

translation.en: Everyone is here!
Look! Papi's journal!
Wait!
-[grunts] -You okay, Dora?
I can't. I'm not ready.
translation.fr:
Je n'y arriverai pas,
je ne suis pas prête.

translation.en: Take my hand. Let's try this together.
translation.fr:
Donne-moi la main,
on va essayer à deux.

translation.en: [Dora] Sammy! Randy!
[both] We've got you, Dora.
Thanks, guys!
-[Randy] What do we do? -[Sammy] Oh, we should sing her a song.
translation.fr: On fait quoi ? On lui chante une chanson ?

translation.en: She likes songs.
♪ Please be alive, Dora, don't be dead ♪
translation.fr: S'il te plaît, sois pas morte, Dora

translation.en: ♪ That sounds like something That you would have said ♪
translation.fr: Cette phrase pourrait être de toi

translation.en: -Oh, I'm not very good at this. -[Randy] It worked!
translation.fr:
- Je ne sais pas faire ça.
- Ça marche.

translation.en: She's waking up.
-Randy? -Oh, thank goodness.
-[Boots grunts softly] -Boots!
Sammy!
-Hi. -You came back.
-You have a nice voice. -[Sammy] Well…
translation.fr:
- Tu as une belle voix.
- Eh bien...

translation.en: sometimes a song's the best idea.
translation.fr: parfois, rien ne vaut une chanson.

translation.en: But not often. Oh, and don't tell anyone I did that.
translation.fr: Mais c'est rare. Et ne le raconte à personne.

translation.en: You're going to be okay.
You know, Dora, I…
I never forgot about the jungle.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais oublié la jungle.

translation.en: And you…
you were my best friend…
and my-- my first friend.
I'm glad I'm here with you, Dora.
translation.fr: Je suis content d'être là avec toi.

translation.en: I mean, this…
this is our next adventure, prima.
Our next adventure, primo.
I-- I had the weirdest dream.
translation.fr: J'ai fait un rêve très bizarre.

translation.en: The entrance to Parapata should be somewhere in these mountains.
translation.fr:
L'entrée de Parapata
devrait se trouver dans ces montagnes.

translation.en: Oh, that's great. For the first time,
I'm actually feeling really good about how things are--
translation.fr:
Pour la première fois,
je le sens bien...

translation.en: [Randy] Ignore what I just said.
translation.fr: Oubliez ce que je viens de dire.

translation.en: This was all hidden down here?
[sighs] Well, great. Now we're stuck in a hole.
translation.fr: Bravo, on est coincés dans un trou.

translation.en: Stars.
[both] It's a star map.
Classic us.
translation.fr: On l'a dit en même temps.

translation.en: But the stars aren't in the correct place.
translation.fr: Mais les étoiles sont mal placées.

translation.en: Awesome.
It's a jungle puzzle! [laughs]
I don't think this is a jungle puzzle.
translation.fr:
Je ne crois pas
que ce soit une énigme de la jungle,

translation.en: Mainly because there's no such thing as a jungle puzzle.
Listen, I've seen several movies about the jungle.
translation.fr:
Écoutez,
j'ai vu plein de films sur la jungle,

translation.en: To solve this, we have to get the stars in the right place.
translation.fr:
et pour gagner,
il faut replacer les étoiles.

translation.en: And when we do, these big stone wheels will turn
translation.fr:
Après, les roues en pierre vont tourner
et on verra le trésor.

translation.en: and the treasure will be revealed. [chuckles] It's gonna be awesome.
translation.fr:
Après, les roues en pierre vont tourner
et on verra le trésor. Ça va être génial.

translation.en: I just need to figure out how to move the first piece.
translation.fr:
Il suffit de trouver
comment bouger la première pièce.

translation.en: Are you sure you should be touching that?
translation.fr: Tu ne devrais peut-être pas le toucher.

translation.en: -[Diego] What is that? -[rattling]
That does not sound like a good noise.
Oh, wait. The stars are in the right position.
translation.fr: Mais si, les étoiles sont bien placées

translation.en: It's the southern hemisphere.
-I was just looking at it the wrong way. -It's still a jungle puzzle, right?
translation.fr:
Je regardais à l'envers. C'est quand même
une énigme de la jungle.

translation.en: Oh! Oh! I don't think this is a jungle puzzle.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas une énigme de la jungle,

translation.en: -This is a puquio. -[Sammy] What the flip is a puquio?
translation.fr:
- c'est un puquio.
- C'est quoi, un puquio ?

translation.en: It's an ancient underground aqueduct.
Inca engineers built some of the most elaborate irrigation systems ever devised.
translation.fr:
Les Incas ont conçu
des systèmes d'irrigation.

translation.en: -Water, from above, using gravity. -[ratcheting]
translation.fr:
L'eau vient d'en haut
grâce à la gravité.

translation.en: -Oh, oh! -Stop pulling levers, Randy! [screams]
Ah! I'm trying to find the off switch!
Okay, if this is an aqueduct, we just need to somehow open the sluice gate.
translation.fr: Si c'est un aqueduc, il faut ouvrir la vanne d'écluse.

translation.en: How do you know so much about aqueducts?
We learned about them last year in history class.
translation.fr: On en a parlé en cours d'histoire.

translation.en: You were there. It was the week you wore a lot of red and pink.
translation.fr:
T'étais là,
habillée en rouge et rose.

translation.en: I look at you a lot, okay?
We need to find the sluice gate. Where is the sluice gate?
translation.fr:
Il nous faut la vanne d'écluse.
Où est la vanne d'écluse ?

translation.en: Please stop saying "sluice gate."
That must be the mechanism that controls the sluice gate.
translation.fr:
Ça doit être le mécanisme
de la vanne d'écluse.

translation.en: That's what it's called, okay? We have bigger thing to deal with right now!
Everyone give me a hand. It's gonna take all of us.
translation.fr:
Aidez-moi,
il faut tous s'y mettre.

translation.en: -One, two, three! -[all inhale]
This is our last chance. It's now or never.
translation.fr:
C'est notre dernière chance,
c'est maintenant ou jamais.

translation.en: -[gasps] -Who here can hold their breath
translation.fr:
C'est notre dernière chance,
c'est maintenant ou jamais. Qui peut retenir sa respiration
sept minutes ?

translation.en: for seven minutes?
translation.fr:
Qui peut retenir sa respiration
sept minutes ?

translation.en: It's hard to tell with all of this water,
but I'm assuming none of your hands are raised.
translation.fr: mais je crois que je suis le seul.

translation.en: This one's mine. [inhales]
Dora!
-Dora! -[Cole] What?
-[Elena] Oh, honey. Oh, honey! -[Cole] Dora!
-Mami! -Oh!
-My baby girl. -[Cole] Honey! Honey!
Randy did it! We're alive!
-Tía, tío. -Okay,
can somebody please tell me what's going on?
We were kidnapped by mercenaries who were after Parapata.
translation.fr: On a été enlevés par des mercenaires.

translation.en: Oh, I did something epic! I'm basically a superhero!
translation.fr:
J'ai fait un truc épique !
Je suis un superhéros.

translation.en: Hi, Dora's parents.
Okay, honey, who are all these people?
We're Dora's friends. From school.
It's fine. Fine.
We're on a field trip.
And where are the mercenaries?
Alejandro saved us from them. And he's with us!
translation.fr: Alejandro nous a sauvés et il est là.

translation.en: -Who? -Your old friend.
-Alejandro, from the university. -You-- You sent him your journal.
translation.fr:
Alejandro, de l'université.
Vous lui avez envoyé le journal.

translation.en: My journal was stolen days before the expedition.
translation.fr:
Mon journal a été volé
avant l'expédition.

translation.en: -[radio beeps] -Bravo team…
this is Alpha leader.
You don't know him, do you?
translation.fr: Vous ne le connaissez pas, c'est ça ?

translation.en: Oh. Miércoles.
-We found them. -[Elena] Honey, come here.
-Get back, kids. -Delta rendezvous point.
You have my location.
-You lied to me. -No, no, no, no, no.
translation.fr:
Vous m'avez menti. - Non, je t'ai bernée...
- C'est pareil.

translation.en: -No, I outwitted you… -That's the same thing.
translation.fr:
- Non, je t'ai bernée...
- C'est pareil.

translation.en: …as I have outwitted every adversary that came before you.
translation.fr: Et j'ai berné tous vos prédécesseurs.

translation.en: Who would have believed that my greatest achievement,
translation.fr:
Qui aurait crû
que ma plus belle réussite,

translation.en: the final act in a prosperous treasure-hunting career
translation.fr:
le dernier acte d'une belle carrière
de pilleur de trésors,

translation.en: would find me squaring off against a socially inept jungle nerd…
translation.fr:
me mettrait face à une inadaptée
maniaque de la jungle.

translation.en: -Hey, hey, hey! -…and three high school losers.
translation.fr:
- Hé, hé, hé !
- Et trois lycéens ratés.

translation.en: I don't know them, so whatever.
translation.fr: Je les connais pas, je m'en fiche.

translation.en: -[exhales] -Now, if you please…
you will lead me to Parapata.
But you can't get inside. It's impenetrable.
translation.fr:
On ne peut pas entrer,
c'est impénétrable.

translation.en: -"Impenetrable!" -That means you can't get inside.
translation.fr:
- Impénétrable.
- Ça veut dire qu'on n'entre pas.

translation.en: -I know! -Okay.
Shut up!
You wouldn't want anything to happen to her…
translation.fr:
Vous voulez
qu'il lui arrive malheur ?

translation.en: now, would you?
-Of course not. -Good.
translation.fr:
- Bien sûr que non.
- Très bien.

translation.en: Good, good.
So, if everyone just plays nice, I'll get my gold,
translation.fr: Si tout le monde est sage, je prends mon or,

translation.en: and you'll be on your way home safe and sound.
translation.fr:
et vous rentrez chez vous
sains et saufs.

translation.en: [scoffs] You're a smart family, right?
translation.fr:
Vous êtes intelligents,
dans la famille ?

translation.en: So, make the smart choice. Hmm?
[Alejandro] We're moving out! Let's go!
I'm so sorry. This is all my fault.
translation.fr:
Je suis désolée, c'est ma faute,
tout ça.

translation.en: If we do what he says, we'll be okay.
translation.fr: Si on obéit, on s'en sortira.

translation.en: [Dora] Sorry, I'm so sorry.
[both] No, we're sorry.
-We love you so much! -[Elena] It's our fault.
Can you all shut up back there?
I've had to listen to your mindless positivity for three days!
translation.fr:
J'ai dû supporter ce positivisme débile
pendant 3 jours.

translation.en: Your relentless good-natured spirit is a holy nightmare!
translation.fr:
Votre bon esprit permanent
est un véritable cauchemar.

translation.en: So just shut up! Shut up!
-I'm so sorry about that. -Yeah-- Shut up!
No more talking.
And definitely no more singing.
Why have you stopped here?
This is it, isn't it?
-Hey, wait. -No, please, wait!
Parapata.
[Diego] It's real!
[Alejandro] We make camp tonight by those gates.
translation.fr:
On passera la nuit
aux portes de la cité.

translation.en: [claps] Come on. ¡Órale!
No, Boots, quit it! No!
Papi wants us to do what they say.
-What's going on back here? -[thud]
-Oops. -Kids! -[Randy squeals] -[Dora] Run!
Wow, it really is the deadliest weapon.
[Powell] Viper! What's going on back there?
Put that down.
What happened?
Viper got yo-yoed.
-Again? -Again.
Take the professors to the gate.
I spent days with these brats.
I know what they'll do next.
translation.fr: je sais ce qu'ils comptent faire.

translation.en: Randy! Where are you guys? [screams]
[Dora] Boots!
You shouldn't have done that!
So what if he's a double-crossing mercenary treasure hunter?
translation.fr:
Oui, ce sont des pilleurs de trésor
et des mercenaires. Et alors ?

translation.en: My parents are gonna show him the treasure and he's gonna let us all go.
translation.fr:
Mes parents vont le guider
et il va nous libérer.

translation.en: He's gonna kill them… isn't he?
translation.fr: Il va les tuer, c'est ça ?

translation.en: He's gonna kill all of us.
I can't save them.
translation.fr: Je ne pourrai pas les sauver.

translation.en: Not by myself.
I'm just a kid. [sighs]
You're not a kid.
But you're not a grownup either, Dora.
translation.fr:
mais tu n'es pas non plus
une adulte, Dora.

translation.en: You're a teenager. It's a super confusing time.
translation.fr: Tu es une ado et c'est un stade très compliqué.

translation.en: But the fact is, you're right, you can't do it by yourself.
translation.fr:
En tout cas, tu as raison,
tu ne peux pas y arriver seule.

translation.en: Good news is you have friends now.
translation.fr:
Heureusement,
tu as des amis maintenant.

translation.en: And together, anything is possible.
Boots, you can talk?
Boots. Hey, Boots. Boots, come on. Boots.
-Hey, did you guys hear that? -Uh. You talking to a monkey?
translation.fr:
- Vous avez entendu ?
- Quand tu parlais au singe ?

translation.en: -[Boots squeals] -No, no, Boots was talking to me.
Maybe she hit her head. [chuckles]
Come on, guys, we have to save my parents.
translation.fr: Venez, il faut sauver mes parents.

translation.en: How? We are teenagers armed with yo-yos.
translation.fr: On est que des ados armés de yoyos.

translation.en: All Alejandro wants is the gold.
And if we can get inside Parapata, we can trade the treasure for my parents.
translation.fr:
Si on entre dans Parapata,
on échangera le trésor contre mes parents.

translation.en: But how are we going to get into Parapata? We're gonna figure it out. Together.
translation.fr: Mais comment veux-tu qu'on entre ? On trouvera un moyen tous ensemble.

translation.en: Tonight.
♪ Guarding the gate I'm guarding the gate ♪
translation.fr:
Je garde l'entrée
Je garde l'entrée

translation.en: ♪ Swiper is guarding the gate ♪
♪ Guarding the gate I'm guarding the gate ♪
translation.fr:
Je garde l'entrée
Je garde l'entrée

translation.en: Would you stop singing? It's unprofessional.
translation.fr: Arrête de chanter, ça fait amateur.

translation.en: How are we gonna get past him?
translation.fr: Comment on va faire, pour passer ?

translation.en: ♪ Guarding the gate I'm guarding the gate ♪
translation.fr:
Je garde l'entrée
Je garde l'entrée

translation.en: Whatcha got there? [gasps]
It's just a little frog.
Oh. Oh, man…
Good job, golden poison frog.
There must be a way to open the gates from the outside.
translation.fr: On doit pouvoir ouvrir de l'extérieur.

translation.en: [Sammy] Hey, guys, look at these.
Each one has a lever.
I was wrong about jungle puzzles, okay?
translation.fr:
Je me suis trompé,
pour les énigmes de la jungle.

translation.en: There is no such thing as a jungle puzzle.
Wait, don't do that! Look. Traps.
translation.fr:
Attends, n'y touche pas !
Regardez. C'est piégé.

translation.en: Could be arrows, or poison.
translation.fr:
Il y a peut-être
des flèches ou du poison.

translation.en: It looks like there's traps everywhere.
translation.fr: Il y a des pièges tout autour.

translation.en: This is one heavy security system.
So, how do we know which levers to pull? There are so many combinations.
translation.fr:
Quel levier il faut tirer ?
Il y a trop de combinaisons.

translation.en: What the--
Guys, look down.
[Randy and Dora] Looks like constellations.
Classic us. Again.
translation.fr: On l'a redit en même temps.

translation.en: [Dora] This is Yawar Mayu, the Inca night sky.
translation.fr: C'est Yawar Mayu, le ciel inca.

translation.en: Ah. Look. Some of the stones retain the light longer.
translation.fr:
Certaines dalles retiennent
la lumière plus longtemps.

translation.en: This is anka, the eagle.
Look.
And that's atuq, the fox.
That's… right there.
This one looks like a serpent.
-[Sammy] Are there any more? -[Diego] This one's otorongo, the jaguar.
translation.fr: Il y en a d'autres ? Otorongo, le jaguar.

translation.en: This must be the fourth lever.
Okay, but… which one should we pull first?
Maybe we pull 'em all at once?
translation.fr: On les tire en même temps ?

translation.en: Well, that's a pretty big "maybe."
At least if we die, we all get to die together, right?
translation.fr:
Si on meurt,
on mourra tous ensemble.

translation.en: On three, we pull.
Ready?
One…
two…
three.
Okay. It's official. Movies lie.
translation.fr:
Comme ça, on le sait,
les films mentent.

translation.en: [Randy] It's a jungle puzzle.
translation.fr: C'était une énigme de la jungle !

translation.en: It's a real freaking jungle puzzle.
translation.fr:
C'est une vraie énigme de la jungle,
la vache !

translation.en: That is so awesome! I'm sorry I doubted you, movies.
translation.fr:
C'est génial !
Pardon d'avoir douté, les films.

translation.en: [Dora] I've never seen anything like it.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais rien vu de pareil.

translation.en: This is the discovery of a lifetime! [chuckles]
[Diego] I guess this must be the temple.
The gold, right?
This is totally where the gold's hidden.
Everything the Inca treasured will be in here.
translation.fr:
Tout ce que les Incas chérissaient
est là.

translation.en: But remember we're explorers, not treasure hunters.
translation.fr:
Par contre, on est des explorateurs,
pas des pilleurs.

translation.en: We're not treasure hunters, but Alejandro sure is.
translation.fr:
On n'est pas des pilleurs,
mais Alejandro, si.

translation.en: So let's be quick.
-[grunting] -Come on. I don't do last.
translation.fr: Allez, je tiens pas à me faire doubler.

translation.en: It's empty.
I don't get it.
[Diego] I don't see any doors.
translation.fr: Il n'y a même pas de porte.

translation.en: This can't be all that there is.
translation.fr: Il doit y avoir autre chose.

translation.en: [Randy] I don't see any treasure.
translation.fr: Je ne vois pas de trésor.

translation.en: [Diego] It was probably cleaned out by Spanish conquistadores.
translation.fr:
Il a dû être raflé
par les conquistadores espagnols.

translation.en: -Or the British. -Or the French.
translation.fr:
- Ou les Britanniques.
- Ou les Français.

translation.en: Or the Americans and the United Fruit Company.
translation.fr:
Ou par les Américains
avec la United Fruit.

translation.en: I found this bowl. Could be treasure.
translation.fr:
J'ai trouvé un bol,
c'est peut-être le trésor.

translation.en: -That's a sun bowl. -[Boots squeals]
[Sammy] You tilt the bowls to reflect the sunlight.
translation.fr:
Il sert à capter
la lumière du soleil.

translation.en: So that must mean there's…
Look! There's an opening in the wall for the sun to shine in.
translation.fr:
Là ! Une ouverture
pour que la lumière entre.

translation.en: [Dora] Well, this flashlight can be our sun. Here, Boots.
translation.fr: La lampe fera office de soleil. Tiens, Babouche.

translation.en: -[Dora] Huh. -Now what?
We have to angle the bowl to the right place in the room.
translation.fr:
Il faut diriger la lumière
vers le bon endroit.

translation.en: -[Dora] Clearly, they loved geometry. -[Sammy] They fit together symmetrically.
translation.fr:
- Ils étaient fous de géométrie.
- Ça s'imbrique de façon symétrique.

translation.en: [both] The golden ratio! 51 degrees.
translation.fr:
Angle d'inclinaison du triangle d'or,
51 degrés.

translation.en: Okay, Randy, angle your bowl 51 degrees to Diego.
translation.fr:
Randy, oriente le bol à 51 degrés
vers Diego.

translation.en: Okay, Diego to me.
Now, I'll turn mine 51 degrees and we'll see where it lands.
translation.fr:
J'incline le mien
et on voit où ça tombe.

translation.en: [gasps] A door! It's opening a door, guys.
translation.fr: Une porte. Ça ouvre une porte.

translation.en: Just hold the beam until the doors are fully open.
translation.fr:
Maintenez le rayon
jusqu'à l'ouverture complète.

translation.en: What is that? Some sort of Ancient Inca group hug?
translation.fr:
C'est quoi ?
Un câlin de groupe antique ?

translation.en: It slipped. I'm sorry.
-Oh, guys. You might want to look up. -Huh?
translation.fr: Oh, les amis... Regardez en haut.

translation.en: The jungle puzzles are turning on us!
translation.fr: Les énigmes se retournent contre nous.

translation.en: -The door's closing! -Everyone run!
-Come on, Boots! -[Boots screams]
Dora, Dora! Try and pull it open.
-It isn't enough! -[Boots grunting]
Thank you! Thank you!
Oh, Boots. [laughs] Good job, buddy!
Whoa. That's some hallway.
[Diego] It's like it goes on forever.
-At the end, is that-- -A giant golden monkey? [laughs]
translation.fr:
- Au bout, c'est...
- Un singe géant en or ?

translation.en: [Randy] We did it, guys. We found the treasure.
translation.fr: On a réussi, on a trouvé le trésor.

translation.en: Wait, these skulls, they look like a--
-…warning. -[loud groaning]
Oh, come on!
[gasps] Spears!
Okay! Okay, I know what we have to do.
translation.fr: Je sais ce qu'il faut faire.

translation.en: When we get to the bottom of the hallway, we have to jump at the same time.
translation.fr: Une fois au bout, il faudra sauter.

translation.en: -It's too far! -What? We will never make it!
translation.fr:
- C'est trop loin !
- On n'y arrivera jamais.

translation.en: No, it's an illusion, okay? Trust me.
-[breathes heavily] -It's okay, Sammy. Just let go. It's okay.
translation.fr: Ça va aller, Sammy, tu peux lâcher.

translation.en: Three, two, one. Go!
Now! Jump!
It was a forced perspective. A trick to fool thieves and trespassers!
translation.fr:
La perspective était faussée, c'était fait
pour décourager les voleurs.

translation.en: -Good job, Diego. -Ancient Inca group hug for the win, guys.
translation.fr: Bravo, Diego. On fait un câlin de groupe pour fêter ça.

translation.en: [Randy] The monkey looked a lot more impressive back there.
translation.fr:
Le singe avait l'air plus imposant,
vu de là-bas.

translation.en: Looks pretty impressive to me.
-Is that an emerald? -[Sammy] It's bigger than a basketball!
translation.fr:
- C'est une émeraude ?
- Elle est plus grosse qu'un ballon.

translation.en: I think we found the treasure, guys.
This is the last puzzle.
Look.
This is a quipu.
Inca written language.
"Make an offering to the Gods…
of that which is most revered."
What did the Inca revere the most?
[Alejandro] That's easy!
The same as me.
Gold.
Oh, crud.
Thanks for getting through the tough stuff for me.
translation.fr:
Merci d'avoir passé les épreuves
à ma place.

translation.en: Once again, I only had to follow Miss Know-It-All,
translation.fr:
Encore une fois, je n'ai eu qu'à suivre
Miss Je-sais-tout,

translation.en: and she led me straight to the gold. [laughs]
translation.fr: et elle m'a mené tout droit à l'or.

translation.en: Gold. Gold! [laughs]
Lots and lots of gold!
The answer to the puzzle is obvious.
translation.fr: La réponse à l'énigme est évidente.

translation.en: The Incas built monuments to their gods with it.
translation.fr:
Les Incas s'en sont servis
pour dédier des monuments à leurs dieux.

translation.en: Gold is as close to touching the sun as the Incas could get.
translation.fr: L'or incarnait le soleil pour les Incas.

translation.en: It's happening! [laughs] It's happening!
translation.fr: Ça y est. Ça y est !

translation.en: It's happening! [laughs]
I beat you! I won!
translation.fr: Je vous ai battus, j'ai gagné.

translation.en: I beat you, I won! I beat you, I won! Ha!
translation.fr:
Je vous ai battus,
j'ai gagné.

translation.en: The treasure is going to be mine!
translation.fr: Le trésor va être à moi.

translation.en: You were wrong about me, Alejandro.
translation.fr: Vous vous êtes trompé sur moi.

translation.en: I'm not a know-it-all.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas une Je-sais-tout.

translation.en: But by now, I do know you.
I knew that you would follow us in here.
translation.fr: Je savais que vous nous suivriez

translation.en: And I knew that you would let us take all the risk for you.
translation.fr:
et que vous nous laisseriez
prendre les risques.

translation.en: I knew the final Inca test would carry
translation.fr: Je savais que le dernier test serait redoutable en cas d'échec.

translation.en: dire consequences for those who should fail it.
Which is why we are over here, and you…
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que nous, nous sommes ici et que vous,

translation.en: Well, you're standing right there.
[Alejandro] I'm still alive!
[radio chirps] Powell! Viper!
Help me! Get in here! Now!
My mercenaries are on their way.
This isn't over yet!
-Dora! -Oh, honey!
-Mami! Papi! I'm so sorry. -[grunting]
It's fine. How cool is this?
Look at these guys, that's a real crossbow.
Honey. That's a real crossbow, yep.
It's the Lost Guardians of Parapata.
translation.fr: C'est les gardiens perdus de Parapata.

translation.en: Ridiculous! There are no lost guardians. I made them up.
translation.fr: N'importe quoi. Ils n'existent pas, j'ai tout inventé.

translation.en: No, they're super real, bro.
translation.fr: Ils sont carrément vrais, mon pote.

translation.en: I think this is when we perish.
-[speaking Quechua] -Dora!
translation.fr: Je vous en supplie, non ! Nous ne sommes pas avec lui.

translation.en: -Be strong, honey, okay? -You choose the right thing.
-[both sigh] -She did it.
-Thank you. Yeah. -Thank you.
Honey.
[gasps] It's like nothing I've…
-ever imagined. -Ever imagined.
It's breathtaking.
Monkey.
Really big gold monkey. [laughs]
translation.fr: Un singe vraiment très gros, en or.

translation.en: [Swiper] Say goodbye to your little friend.
What is happening?
-Swiper! -Adiós, losers!
Everyone get out of here!
-What about the gold? -It doesn't matter!
Wait, guys! What about me?
You can't leave me here!
Dora! Randy! Help me!
We're a team! Guys!
[Sammy] Dora, come on!
[Alejandro] I knew the answer was water!
Can you give me another go?
I was joking about the gold! Of course not gold!
translation.fr:
Je ne pensais pas à l'or.
Bien sûr que ce n'était pas l'or,

translation.en: Water is precious!
Honey, let's go!
And you'll never find it now, man!
translation.fr: Vous remettrez pas la main dessus.

translation.en: We gotta go! I love Parapata, but I don't want to be stuck here forever.
translation.fr:
Vite ! J'adore Parapata
mais je ne veux pas y rester.

translation.en: -Boots! -[Swiper] Get off me, monkey!
Oh, man. The indignity!
That's it.
-[Elena] Dora, no! -[Cole] Dora, wait!
[Elena] What are you doing?
[Elena] Dora! You did it!
Should we put up a sign saying, "Choose the water"?
-[laughter] -No? Okay.
Dora…
Look, I know we weren't exactly friends when this trip started, but I--
translation.fr:
On ne s'appréciait pas beaucoup
au début, mais...

translation.en: I like you, too.
-Dora's staring at us again, isn't she? -Yeah.
Mom, Dad!
We have some exciting news.
We're going back into the jungle in a few weeks.
translation.fr:
On repart dans la jungle
dans quelques semaines.

translation.en: We'll be gone for a few months, no contact, -just us against the elements. -Mm-hmm.
translation.fr:
On va partir plusieurs mois,
seuls dans la nature,

translation.en: Me and your mom.
And you.
We're onto something big, Dora.
About that.
[Randy] Someone pulled a lever, not sure who, but--
translation.fr:
Quelqu'un a tiré un levier,
je ne sais pas qui...

translation.en: -You. You! -[Diego] You know who it was.
I think…
I think I want to go back to the city.
translation.fr: que j'ai envie de retourner en ville.

translation.en: I know the jungle pretty well.
-Okay. -But, um, high school…
I think I need more time to study that culture.
translation.fr:
Je voudrais pouvoir étudier
cette civilisation-là

translation.en: And its indigenous people.
-Right. Yeah, sure. -Yeah. Yeah. Uh-huh.
-That's good. -I love you guys.
-We love you, too. -We love you, sweetheart.
-[both sobbing] -Oh, God, what is happening?
-She has a life of her own now. -I'm so happy for her.
translation.fr:
- Elle a sa vie à elle.
- Je suis content pour elle.

translation.en: I'm so happy.
It's gonna be okay, babe. It's gonna be okay.
It's not gonna be okay!
[Cole continues sobbing] But I'm so happy for her.
Hey, look. The Dork-as multiplied.
translation.fr: La dorade a fait des petits.

♪ We found the gold in Parapata ♪
translation.fr: On a trouvé l'or à Parapata

translation.en: ♪ Oh, hooray, we did it ♪
♪ Deep in South America ♪

translation.fr:
J'ai des boutons,
Je peux pas dire que ça me gêne

translation.fr:
Être ensemble, on adore
C'est ça, notre trésor

♪ We'll be best friends forever ♪

♪ Oh, hooray, we did it ♪
♪ I think I may have dysentery ♪

♪ Stopped Alejandro and all his crew ♪
translation.fr: On a battu Alejandro et ses gars

♪ And everyone saw me do a number two ♪
translation.fr: Et tout le monde m'a vue faire caca

Être ensemble, on adore
C'est ça, notre trésor

♪ We'll be best friends forever ♪

♪ Can someone get me out of here? ♪
♪ Oh, hooray, we did it ♪
♪ Oh, hooray, we did it ♪
♪ There were times When it was frightening ♪
♪ Oh, hooray, we did it ♪
[both] Swiper, no swiping!
Oh, man!
♪ We came together That's the real treasure ♪

Être ensemble, on adore
C'est ça, notre trésor

♪ We'll be best friends forever ♪

Être ensemble, on adore
C'est ça, notre trésor
